com.flipkart.service

Interface NotificationInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NotificationInterfaceImpl

    public interface NotificationInterface
    Notification logic for sending notifications for multiple events such as 1. Student Registration 2. Registration Approval 3. Fee payment
